column6: 10 из 10 Превосходное слайд-шоу!
Binary Domain was yet another part of a (free) bundle given away by SEGA
column7: featuring mediocre games mainly. When I started playing it
column8: I was expecting an average shooter (the reviews didn't provide much clue). What I got was an absolutely positive surprise in all aspects. But I'm not explaining this fact that I liked this game so much with the element of surprise: I wish every overhyped AAA game could provide as much fun as Binary Domain did. It has everything a good game needs: a thrilling story
column9: excellent characters and funny (!) dialogues
column10: choices & consequences and of course great combat with fluid controls. This is one of those games that would require a sequel
column11: but apparently won't get one
column12: since the game never received the proper amount of praise and appreciation it should have deserved.  We are in 2080
column13: when our protagonist
column14: Dan Marshall is sent to Tokyo
column15: Japan on a covert operation as a part of an international strike team to investigate the case of a robot manufacturing corporation. This firm is apparently assembling highly advanced human-like robots
column16: which is prohibited worldwide. The case is of course more intricate and dangerous than it first appears to be and soon Dan is going to have to make some tough choices as he makes shocking discoveries not only regarding the plans of the sinister Amada Corporation
column17: but also about some of his own teammates.  The game uses classic
column18: fluid third-person shooter controls
column19: just like Dead Space does
column20: combined with the cover using system similar to the one in Mass Effect. The effective use of covers is mandatory on higher difficulties as the enemies always attack in large groups and use rapid firing machine guns. There are (slidebar-based) quick time events during cinematics
column21: but strangely enough
column22: these are are not annoying at all
column23: like in some other games (they are just ensuring we don't fall asleep during the cutscenes
column24: which wouldn't happen anyway). Our enemies are (mostly) humanoid robots and shooting them is termendous fun: they break
column25: explode and fall apart in the most spectecular ways. Their armor plates fall and shatter as we shoot them
column26: their limbs come off but they remain dangerous even after being crippled
column27: they can crawl around and jump on us. Boss fights are spectacular
column28: prepare for multi-phased battles and try to use heavy weaponry or alternative methods laying around. Because of the robots the game may appear to be suitable for children at first glance
column29: later on (in one of the first cinematics actually) however due to the sensitive nature of the content being displayed (and the story)
column30: I would heavily advise against it.  The level design is great: altough linear throughout and the corridors the fights take place in are relatively tight
column31: the illusion of large open areas works pretty well. The creators successfully managed to avoid of the cliché of futuristic underground areas and sewer crawling (altough we got a fair share of those as well) by providing us some exicting and beautiful environments of future Tokyo
column32: such as a café terrace or a crowded disco and an amazing ride on a monorail.  An interesting feature of the game is a unique voice command system
column33: but I would recommend using the buttons instead (don't forget to recalibrate them
column34: the original layout is a bit weird
column35: it is originally a console game after all). This command system is used to give basic orders and also to reply/answer to our squad members. The games also utilizes a trust system which affects certain parts of the story
column36: to an extent that some of our team members can even betray us. The trust level of our teammates can be increased by giving them the right answers when being asked or during combat
column37: by shooting enemies in the head or bashing them in melee (if we shoot them accidentally or are being rude to them
column38: it'll go down). I have to mention here that the dialogues are well-written and funny
column39: there were parts when I laughed out loud (something that doesn't happen very often). We can select 2 (sometimes more) companions before missions
column40: so if we want to be on good terms with everyone
column41: we should choose each one of them at least a couple of times (plus they all react differently at certain key situations
column42: not to mention that the ending changes accordingly
column43: whether a certain character trusts us enough or doesn't). Their AI is pretty good: they won't get p0wned easily (they CAN die permanently however
column44: so be careful!)
column45: but don't expect them to take down a tougher enemy on their own either (they can and will automatically revive us
column46: if we are down). The sexy Chinese sniper and the robot with the French accent are usually the best choice (when they are available) since they are both capable fighters and perform well in most situations.  There are vending machines all over the game
column47: where we can buy ammo and more importantly upgrade our weapon's attributes. Everyone comes with a special weapon which they are proficient with and while a secondary weapon can be equipped
column48: everyone should use their primary/favourite weapon class all times for the sake of efficiency. The guns of our companions can be upgraded as well. The nanomachines are enhancements that increase a certain character's attributes (max health
column49: regeneration
column50: etc. and most importantly a trust level increasing mod - see the picture below) and for additional background information or plot elements security coms can be collected.   https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=726488680   Some people complained about the graphics
column51: something I had no problems with: I found it satisfactory overall and amazing at certain locations (the upper city for example)
column52: not to mention the monumental action scenes where I was simply blown away by the graphics
column53: with all the falling pieces
column54: explosions
column55: and the effective use of blur. The characters and facial animations are pretty well made
column56: even today - at the time of this review. The abundance of greatly choreographed cutscenes almost make us feel like we were watching a (good action) movie.   https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=726484956   The music is one of the best I've heard in a video game so far
column57: it's up there with the OST of the original Unreal
column58: System Shock 2
column59: Deus Ex or Far Cry: Blood Dragon. It mostly consists of fast paced techno/rave tracks (the one during the  jet ski ride  is especially awesome) with a pinch of Japanese influence
column60: perfect for an action game. The robots and guns sound great
column61: either when metal connects metal
column62: or when the giant robots roar at us. The voice acting is superb as well
column63: even the different accents and word usage accordingly are well made.  I didn't have the opportunity to try the multiplayer mode out
column64: I hope I'll get to one day.  Binary Domain is an underrated gem
column65: which starts out as a 'regular' sci-fi action game
column66: but turns into much more (both in gameplay and plot)
column67: with the loveable characters
column68: the choices we have to make
column69: the action-packed cutscenes and the splendid gameplay. Do yourself a favour and don't just let it sit in your library... play it

column71: higly enjoyable gameplay + great setting and some amazing looking locations + good plot with interesting characters and well-written dialogues + plenty of memorable cutscenes make the game more cinematic + superb controls (once you reset them) + robots break apart and explode in various ways + impressive boss fights + excellent soundtrack  CONS - original key layout is trash - the joke ending feels quite lame and unnecessary  RATING 9/10

column6: Free with a surprisingly good story. The game is made in the RenPy visual novel engine
column7: which is rather ambitious since the game's core gameplay does not lend itself well to the engine. It takes place on a grid-based chess system reminiscent of games like Fire Emblem
column8: but with less of an emphasis on physical surroundings and more of a focus on spatial distance between targets. The engine does what it can to render everything well
column9: but often times it feels bloated- like they were almost confining themselves by keeping the game in the RenPy engine. The game's battle system is well thought out but leaves much to be desired in its execution
column10: so I would not recommend playing the game on any difficulty setting higher than " Visual Novel."   The characters are enjoyable act as the lynchpin to the game as a whole. As this is the first chapter
column11: it focuses on each of the characters meeting in various ways and learning how to work with each other for the greater good. The plot is reminiscent of a barebones Mass Effect
column12: but I believe that it does a better job at depicting loss in war than titles like Mass Effect 3 did- high praise for a visual novel. There is a little bit of voiceacting for battles. The voicing is fairly reasonable given the budget of the game
column13: but certain characters' voiceovers do start to get grating after hearing certain memes and clichés ad nauseum.  It's free
column14: so if you're curious
column15: please do take a look and make your own judgments.

column8: a iniciativa da BS STUDIOS foi magnifica. Lucrar com a verdade!!  O JOGO - Consiste em sobreviver a cada fase em meio a varios militantes sendo que no final de cada uma dessas fases você irá enfrentar um ''adversário'' do ''Bolsomito''. Entre vários inimigos lixos o progresso do jogo e totalmente simples e com um nível de dificuldade relativamente baixo.   A HISTORIA - No progresso das fases você irá encontrar varias celebridades amigas do Bolsomito. O desenvolvedor caprichou nesse ponto.. Vivos ou n?o.. muito interessante!!  Pós - Trilha sonora - Perfeita e ainda com grandes sons do momento.!! - Menu - Tudo bem organizado e de rápido entendimento. - Cenários - A BS STUDIOS manteve algumas características do Brasil. - Gráfico - Por mais simples que seja os pixels
column9: cada detalhe do jogo ficou totalmente nítido do que o desenvolvedor queria mostrar.  - Dificuldade - Isso e um dos ponto mais legais. Assim se torna mais complicado divulgar o jogo.  - Jogabilidade - A jogabilidade do game e macia porem em alguns momentos a resposta dos comandos e lenta.Pode considerar uma característica porem achei isso um pouco cansativo.   NOTA FINAL Comprem o jogo o quanto antes!! O ministério publico informou ontem que o jogo será investigado e assim provavelmente ir?o tirar o jogo de circula??o alegando algum motivo ridículo. NAO ARRISQUE.. Compre AGORA!! Muito improvável estar falando bobagem mas se o desenvolvedor for notificado provavelmente terá que remover o conteúdo da LOJA STEAM e todos n?o ir?o mais poder comprar e perder?o a chance de jogar.Compre sua copia e garanta o jogo para sempre! column7: 买！ 虽然是dlc地狱，但是真正的月厨会点下面的那个绿色按钮的，是吧？ ----------------------------------------------------------------------- 说一下，有人说无法调分辨率，在下载界面直接点开始游戏是没有配置工具的。 要在游戏库里点开始游戏，然后会出现两个选项，下面的就是配置工具，可以调各类选项，游戏里是没有设置的。  个人感觉移植得还可以，就是键位仍然是ps4的，插上x1手柄竟然是让我按B确认。

「_率のスポ`ツ」と言われるバスケットボ`ルを キャラクタ`のステ`タスと操作における立ち回りによって プレイヤ`の合中の各N行(シュ`ト、ブロック、リバウンドなど)の成功_率を管理し、 椁摔いてあらゆる期待を高めながら立ちまわった方を倮として表Fしたゲ`ムデザインがそれっぽいと感じました。  登訾工毳ャラクタ`は主にポジションによって大きく性能が浃铯盲皮るので、 チ`ムのMみ方やマ`クのチェンジ、lのマ`クで儇に行くかなど チ`ムの意思E通が大きく・擞绊するのですが、 野良チ`ムでは定型チャットしか手段がないのでかい意思贿_は不可能です。  野良とパ`ティのチ`ム椁しいのはFPSのジャンルなどでもそうなんでしょうが、 何分ゲ`ムが3on3なので影が大きいです。  リアルマネ`を欷堡毪冗`ってくるのはキャラクタ`のファッション、アクションやステ`タスの成L要素。 しかし先述したように立ち回りでY浃铯盲皮るため、 ステ`タスの上Nが「多少o理なプレイングが通るようになる」といったバランスなのも好印象です。  追＠2017末 というゲ`ムだったのですが最近サ`バ`をy合して全世界でマッチングするようになったY果、 ラグが深刻なものになり完全にiき去った相手が後ろからワ`プしてブロックしてくるゲ`ムに。 状r判断のしようのない超r空ストリ`トバスケと化したのでオススメしません。

column6: Far: Lone Sails is the meditative traveling side-scroller game. The gameplay is based around the movement from the very left screen to the very right
column7: with the help of the strange vessel called Okomotive.  You'll need to solve various logical puzzles on your way
column8: which are based mostly on the special features of your vessel. Like the sails: they are needed to push you forward when the wind is right
column9: but once it will be necessary to spread them against the wind to roll back a bit... All the puzzles and game situations are unique
column10: the only repetitive element of gameplay is about fuelling your Okomotive over and over. And sometimes fixing it on the movement
column11: like it was in FTL: Faster Than Light.  The game is quite short
column12: you'll need 1.5-3 hours to beat it... Yet
column13: only the half of the people played it ever made this way to its end. Why? Well
column14: it is boring. Not by repetitiveness
column15: it's all about that 'Deep Atmosphere"  the game promises. It was not made for everyone around. I'd say
column16: it's quite melancholic
column17: like watching the hard rain through your window some cold and lonely October day. There's no drive in FAR: Lone Sails (if you want something like Dead Cells or Hyper Light Drifter from a sidescrolling game).   It's rather some piece of post-modern art. If you like watching the rain... Well
column18: I'd say it's a very good game you should definitely need to try. Maybe you'll even get some catharsis at the end of that journey... Or not.  My mark is 6.5/10. Far: Lone Sails is beautiful... but there are not so many people who'll really enjoy the " Big Nothing"  and loneliness. Even in the short game.   Русская версия обзора здесь:  http://specialgamesclub.ru/far-lone-sails-beleet-parus-odinokij.html

column6: 冒^から何ですが、今作は 生B系シミュレ`ションゲ`ム ? サンドボックスゲ`ム 、ひいては カジュアルゲ`ム や 荪博` が好きな方も 是非入を视して欲しいゲ`ム であると始めに明させていただきます。  なんだイ饯Δ耍・任窑胜ら思うところではありますが、本来P不精であるP者が初プレイ半ばで「今すぐレビュ`をかなきゃ！」と思い至るほど感化されたのは本当に久々のことでしたので、どうぞご容赦いただきたく???。    ◇ カジュアルと奥深さのバランス ◇  本来この手の生B系を取りQうシミュレ`タ`としては、地(テライン)や莺颏胜伞⑺^ゴッドゲ`ムでおs束の地形(h境)を整えたのちに又参铯芜M化を促すのが定石だと思います。それは前述のような「h境による外的要因」が多ければ多いほどシミュレ`トのステ`ジで生B系に及ぼす浠が}j化し、ゲ`ムとしての奥深さにがるからに`いありません。  しかしながら今作  Equilinox  では、地莪h境には手を入れず、 又参铯蛑苯右挨朔扭 ところから生B系を作り上げます。要はシミュレ`ションライクなカジュアルゲ`ムじゃん、と思われるかもしれませんが、このカジュアルさこそが白眉でした。 プレイ中はリラックスしていても、ゲ`ムをKえたときに表れる「^使って身体まで疲れた」感は、シミュレ`ションゲ`ムをプレイする方ならご理解いただけると思います。 しかしカジュアルだからこそ、あれをやらなきゃ、これもやらなきゃ、あれ？必要条件てなんだったっけ???というシミュレ`ションゲ`ム特有のせわしなさが 出来るだけ削がれている のです。 モバイルゲ`ムの登鲆岳础カジュアル化の可否は俎上にdることが多くなりましたが、こと生B系のように}jなシミュレ`トを必要とする今作においては非常に抗的なアプロ`チだと思います。 それとなにより、 普段シミュレ`ションゲ`ムをプレイしない方も快mにSしめる という点において大きな意xがあるはずです。  しかしP者がまず感じたのは、カジュアルさについてではなく「ゲ`ムとして表Fされた生B系の`和感のなさ」でした。 登訾工肷物の多さも然る事ながら、 生育h境が合わないと徐々に数をpらす植物 や、 m合したh境でなくともM出しようとする游镞_のたくましさ 、更には 突然洚して色やサイズを浃à肷物の神秘性 等、「地味ながらごく自然なシミュレ`ト」が感慨深かったのです。 また、又参铯咸跫を氦郡工长趣沁M化させることも可能で、そのHにも 体L浠 や 体内色素の割合浠 等が必要条件になることがあります。 Y果的にプレイヤ`が手を加えた地域の生物には外に差が生じますので、自分の箱庭がどのように浠を遂げるのか、というサンドボックスゲ`ムとしてのSしみ方も内包するNかなプレイフィ`ルとなっています。  ストアペ`ジのB介文にもありますが、もともとこのゲ`ムは リラックスしてSしめる ことを念^において制作されています。 それ故にカジュアルなシステムを裼盲筏皮い毪长趣舷胂瘠穗yくないのですが、 生B系シミュレ`タ`としての奥深さ も思いっきりkFさせているあたりに_kの矜持が感じ取れます。    ◇ もうちょっとだけAくんじゃ ◇   ポコポコと自婴欠敝长工毪わいい又参 、 草花の生育欷冥るにつれて色付いていく大地 、 元荬擞った彼らを祝福するようにをのぞかせる朝け と、荬氐驻筏iかりのない本作ですが、唯一のy点をい菠毪趣筏郡槿毡菊Zでロ`カライズされていないことですね???もっとも、 に ロ`カライズされた上で 更にに gがg装されたとしたら、定の3倍支Bっても全く惜しくないほどのクオリティのゲ`ムです。  要sせずに思うままいたので、流石にL文の域を超えてしまいました??? column6: 『CLANNAD』（クラナド）正式版レビュ`（スポイラ`少しがあります）    『CLANNAD』（クラナド）は、Keyが制作した3作目の恋邾ドベンチャ`ゲ`ム。このペ`ジではこのゲ`ムを原作として、メディアミックス的展_がなされたアニメやコミックなどの作品群についても解hする。しかしこのレビュ`では、私はテレビコミックに焦点を当てます。このゲ`ムについて、原作品のHD版「1920x1080 (HD) 以上の解像度）」ですけど、インタ`フェイスと字幕はただ英Zをサポ`トします。けれども、それはまだ完璧なゲ`ムです。     クラナドは、どんな人生の意味を表Fしますか。この究Oの}の答えについて、次の段落でそれについてhする。    クラナドは一般人たちのスト`リ`ですけど、よかったら、この物Zを真面目にiみください。人は三回に成Lする： 一回?自分はこの世界の中心ではないさとき。 二回?どんな努力しても、やっぱりすることができないものがあります。 三回?たとえできないことがあります、ても全力であたる。  学@に、不良となっていた主人公の崎朋也は、ある日学@前の坂道で女子生徒の古河渚と出会う。この一般人のスト`リ`はここから始まります。「俺たちは、登り始める。LいLい、坂道を。」このスト`リ`をKえたら、この「Lい坂道」は意味があると思います。明らかに、この道は私たち人生のMむ道です。私たちの前にどのような人生があるのかは全く分かりません。でも、努力は常にgり多いものになるでしょう。    その他ヒロインらが演〔郡卧俳àf力します   https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1142366332  アフタ`スト`リ`に、朋也は卒I後、芳野v介の所属している莨な禄嵘绀司吐する。渚は病荬ちで留年をRり返しながらも朋也にWれて1年後に学@卒Iを成す。父?直幸の}により、朋也の会社での出世は果たせなくなるものの、それが朋也と渚がY婚するきっかけとなる。Y婚後、渚は崎 汐を出bするものの、母Hである渚が出b後に死亡する。その後、あまりの虚o感から朋也は育工扦ず、母方の祖父?祖母である古河 秋生、古河早苗が5年ほど汐の育工颏工搿    泣いていいのは、おトイレかパパの胸の中だって   https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1145014405  その後早苗の画により、朋也は汐と二人で直幸の故_へ旅行し、祖母の崎史乃と面会。祖母は直幸の^去をZり、これにより朋也と直幸は和解した。その後、朋也が汐を引き取り育工蚴激幛毪狻⑾は病荬ちとなり、旅行に出かけた冬の日雪の中で倒れる。 その一方で、朋也にvSした人_の}を解Qしていき、各ル`トを攻略することで得られる「光の玉\ライトオ`ブ」を拾っていく事により、KPの世界が入れ替わるきっかけとなっていく。    小さな手のひら   https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1144217129  家族邸⒂亚椁矍椁悉长挝镎Zに最大限に表Fします。「泣いていいのは、おトイレかパパの胸の中だって．．．」渚、つけたよ。やっとつけたんだ。俺にしか守れないもの、俺にしか守れないかけがえのないもの、それは、ここにあった。椋が言ってた、ちょっとしたキッカケで未来はどう分かれるかわからない。私、これから自分たちがMむ道には、たくさんの可能性があると思いたいんです。人生には究Oの意xはないだけど、この世でQ生されることを制されたのはひどいですけど、この「たくさんの可能性がある」光の玉を探しましょう。だから、たとえできないことがあります、ても全力であたる。それは完璧な人生と呼ばれることができます。

column6: 我又来泼冷水了，没时间写的太细太扎实，会有很多直觉错误和文法问题，凑合着看吧。  我仍然推荐每个人在看之前先自己去玩，因为这类游戏，阅读任何评测都是剧透。  我仍然推荐每个人在看之前先自己去玩，因为这类游戏，阅读任何评测都是剧透。  我对整个作品的评价是极度接近90/100的水平但是弱了一点，但是这个弱的点到底是出于Lucas Pope希望把每一个有意思的考察点都涉及到还是说单纯是船员-功能-死亡故事这个巨大构造的空隙不太方便用别的东西填补我不太清楚。  几个非常精彩的取巧点：  1：不解释深层次原因/用超自然解决问题，才可以做到利用静态画而不是动态来呈现故事，这是只有这种方法才能这么做的，一个是外力能产生奇观，第二是对于保险人员来说心理本身并不重要，至少是次要的。  2：说是非线性，实际上每一组事件中间的门槛是用心设计的，这让前半段的并行展开变得非常精彩，但又通过非常克制的画面/信息不至于让玩家脑力过饱和。展开的结构可以说是整个游戏最值得击节赞赏的部分。  3：几个事件本身确实没什么太大新意，但足够有多样性，这让游戏流程不会显得太单薄，但是总体联系在一起之后显得有点乏力和缺乏掌控性，这也让整个故事在最后收尾时有点让人意犹未尽，尤其是最后的结局之后，可能Lucas真的有那么一点自信过头了。希望下一部能不要这么自信吧。  4：人名-死因的玩法本质是对于观察的奖励，也是将玩家所思所想与作者构建图景的一种嵌合和连接。但由于1，在这种去目的的图景当中，嵌合的过程并不包含嵌入的强制认同，这反而产生了我们换一个说法可以称之为冷静的感觉。我不知道很多人对Lucas Pope的崇拜是不是来源于这里（所谓的性冷淡风格），因为Paper
column7: Please也有一种类似的东西，但后者的背景某种程度上显示了其立场吧。  5（追加）：之前忘了单独拎出来，但其实这一点还蛮重要的。就是Lucas Pope没有放弃故事和现实的连接。这不是一个放弃了基底的作品，但拥有如此负重的他却看上去还玩的蛮开心的。不得不说这就是实力。  问题：  1：为了在结构上保有控制权，稳住体验的下限。整个游戏的流程其实是非常“游戏化”的。这和前作Paper
column8: Please类似，但从统一程度来看Obra Dinn是略逊一筹的。  2：侦探类游戏到最后不可避免的排除法使用这一点，他所需要的信息排查到游戏流程最后的最后，和1-bit画风这一点产生了冲突，这也就是整体游戏结构不可解的矛盾，应该叫做咬尾蛇？但还好，这个矛盾的规模被控制住了，在这点上只能说，毕竟人是无法超越常识的，创作者是无法超越玩家的，内容是无法炸翻结构的。  3：优点1也使得整个故事终究只是故事，这也是这个游戏无法在我心目中超越90分的一个原因。放弃了宏大叙事追求本身不是罪过，比起Tacoma这种想讲故事却不好好动脑子的要强很多，但终究是限制了内容的天花板。最后这个游戏在世界上的定位只能是一个以机制出彩的东西，就和Her Story那样，但是和Her Story并列，真的是一件很可惜的事。  废话：  真正让我佩服Lucas Pope的是，他拿着宏大的想法面对一个小框，却愣是用时间和天才般的直觉把东西塞进去了，而且面对结构上的根本问题，并不逃避。  你可以说他很有野心，但他同时也很谦逊。从某种意义上确实是非常干净完美的品格。  我希望四年后能看到他更多的展现内心的一些东西。

Всем привет) Вообщем читал много обзоров на данную игру и был удивлен.... отрицательных действительно много. Напишу чисто свою точку зрения по данной Вн.. Сюжет- Кто бы что ни говорил но задумка сюжета реально интересна.Тебе ни кто не скажет где ты и в какой год попал и.т.д)  Начинаешь задумываться о том как ты попал сюда и что это за лагерь такой из которого не выйти. Вообщем цепляет и мне было не впадлу пройти на все концовки. (Общее время на все концовки с перемотками займет около (30 часов а то и больше) Атмосфера- Тут уж извините но атмосфера СССР и пионер лагеря передаеться на ура. Персонажи- Их не много

column6: Фаршированные яйца с помидорами и беконом 2 полоски бекона; 6 яиц
column7: сваренных вкрутую;  3 ст.л. майонеза или сливочного соуса;  2 ст.л. мелко нарезанных помидор;  2 ч.л. оливкового масла;  соль и свежемолотый черный перец по вкусу;  1 столовая ложка мелко нарезанного зеленого лука.  Поджарьте бекон на сковородке на среднем огне в течение 3-х минут с каждой стороны. Поместите на бумажное полотенце
column8: чтобы убрать лишний жир. Аккуратно разрежьте яйца пополам и удалите желтки от каждой половины. Положите пустые половинки яиц на сервировочное блюдо круглой стороной вниз. Если яйца слишком не устойчивы
column9: можно аккуратно срезать тоненький кусочек от ?дна?
column10: но так
column11: чтобы не прорезать отверстие. Разомните желтки в отдельной миске с помощью вилки и добавьте все масляные ингредиенты. Нарежьте бекон на мелкие кусочки и добавьте половину бекона в желтки. Затем добавьте 1 столовую ложку помидоров и аккуратно перемешайте. Теперь можно добавить в начинку соль и специи. Нафаршируйте яйца. Перемешайте оставшиеся части бекона и помидор вместе с зеленым луком. Украсьте этой смесью верхнюю часть фаршированных яиц. Приятного аппетита!

Без фансервиса в наше время игр уже не делают...там даже в начале игры шутка есть на эту тему) Единственная проблема пока в геймпаде. игра видит только геймпад от хбокса как бы это смешно не звучало. Графика соответствует где-то 99 году.   Я бы рад посмотреть на полуголых красавиц

column6: ?☆?☆?☆?☆?☆?☆?☆?☆?☆?☆?☆?☆?☆?☆?☆?  This is such a  cute and fun  little Halloween-themed game. I really like the format which combines  traditional RPGs  with a bit of a  choose-your-own-adventure  element. It's a short game
column7: but you can tell that plenty of thought and care has been put into all the little details. The writing is believable and entertaining
column8: the  spooky atmosphere  is well crafted
column9: and the little extras really make the game feel fleshed out despite its length. There's even an unlockable outfit
column10: and it actually changes the narrative a little bit!  I really liked the  pixel art
column11: especially for our main character in her pumpkin outfit. I would love to see how the game would look with similarly pixel-styled text boxes and full character illustrations
column12: and I think the achievements could benefit from being made in a pixel art style as well
column13: but overall I did enjoy the art style as a whole.  The main thing I'd like to express about this little game is the character of it. It's successfully  immersive
column14: and I found myself finishing it with great affection for the characters and the story.  Trick & Treat  combines a genuine  eerie feeling  with some  well-placed humour
column15: and I really enjoyed playing it. ☆?.*???

以下是我对这游戏的真实感想：        1.首先感谢送我这个游戏的小可爱！像这种既能玩奇迹暖暖又能玩恐怖游戏的人不多了！显然她不知道我不敢玩这类型游戏，因为我只敢玩玩少女游戏。        2.画面，音效都很不错，就是小男孩有点面瘫。场景啊材质感啊什么的都很棒。        3.操作键什么的有点多，毕竟我只能把换装游戏玩好的手残。、        4.杀死第一个人后，我疯了，我竟然开始期待后面的人是怎么死的，不过杀老人还是有点点罪恶感        5.玩到现在，地图就是小恶魔的家，妈的家好大。我觉得跟个迷宫一样。。好累        6.杀人效果不错，血腥，爽！爽！哈哈哈        7.警察弱鸡，剧情一般般，反正就是个杀杀杀的游戏        8.这游戏我是死拉着我表弟陪我玩的，尽管他才上五年级，但是我觉得他这么小，应该见多点世面。   我不是害怕，真的          9.这游戏我给8/10分，不错不错，   顺便求点胆子大的好友呀嘿嘿嘿
Идеальная бесплатная игра

column6: La saga Metro y más aún la saga Metro en su edición Redux es una compra obligada para cualquier jugador que medianamente le guste la fantasía de un mundo en yermo donde la mutación y el terror se extiende por toda la superficie.  Los juegos siguen fielmente la historia de los libros originales con el mismo título. En ellos  encarnaremos a su protagonista
column7: Artyom. Este joven ruso
column8: si quererlo ni beberlo
column9: se verá envuelto en una travesía por las últimas resistencias de la humanidad que han relegado su existencia y residencia al subsuelo y los viejos conductos del metro. Este juego sería la 1a parte  de los 3  juegos programados (en principio).  + La historia se nos muestra como un juego FPS de acción
column10: y sigílo dividido en capítulos donde destaca el  gran detalle y cuidado por los escenarios. Los personajes y la historia son interesantes. Los asentamientos y peque?as residencias pobladas despiertan el interes y suscitan a la exploración.  + La historia tiene una curva de epicidad que hace que el jugador vaya introduciendose en la historia más y más.   + Capta muy bien la sensación de estar indefenso o en desventaja frente al entorno. Peque?as mecánicas como tener que cambiar el filtro de la máscara de gas y limpiar el empa?ado de las lentes de la mascara me flipan..   +El conjunto Graficos
column11: doblaje (ruso/ingles) y sonido es sobresaliente  -Algo negativo a destacar es la linealidad del juego. Es casi en todo momento un pasillo unidireccional lo cual limita la exploración ya que no nos deja visitar las zonas de asentamiento y parece que nos empuja unicamente a avanzar la historia. Estaría bien que nos dejaran perdernos más en el mundo de metro.  ESTE PUNTO mejora bastante en su segunda parte
column12: y parece que en su tercera entrega lo afrontará de un modo diferente ofreciendo un mundo parcialmente abierto.   Mi conclusión es que si te interesa jugar un FPS y quieres vivir una aventura con una historia que te enganche pronto esta es la opción más adecuada.  Es un juego sobresaliente

なのでLiS2への幛ぅ靴去工蛞证à椁欷胜し饯稀⒁坏┞浃磷扭い皮ら つっかけでコンビニに行くぐらいのSさで でプレイするといいと思います。   ◇ グラフィック面の化?システム周りの刷新について ◇  前作 はUnreal Engine 3で制作されていましたが、今作からはUnreal Engine 4が使用されているようです。 これはもちろんLiS2も同じ仕だと思いますが、UE4に移行したことにより要求スペックが 地味に 上がっています。  うおおおお！Chrisくんの後ろめっちゃなめらか！いい意味でのっぺりしてコミックっぽい！ とはしゃいでたら ごっこ[びしてる最中にガックンガックンFPSが落ち てびっくりしました。 一目でM化をg感できるグラフィックですが、P者のように化石PCをお使いの方や、スペックに不安のある方は LiS2のデモ版 として本作をプレイしてみることをおすすめします。 また、 甏(返事をする)システム や 能力を活用することで浠するxk肢 等、前作主人公の  Max  とは若干なる操作性が垣gえ、まさしくLiS2で活きるであろうこれら要素のお披露目作品という让妞猡ります。   ◇ スト`リ`について ◇ Chrisくんがとにかく健荬橇激ぷ印というか子供ながらに自分の境遇を理解したうえで菡嗓苏裎瑜盲皮い牍があるので、テキストをiんだりパパと会する度に尚更胸がまる思いでした。 父子共に同じ悲しみを抱えているとはいえ、父には父の、子には子の思いがあり、その思いが枷となっているというzみ入った描写は すごくいやらしい さすがLiSシリ`ズです。 どうか事Bが好してほしいといつつ、 でもこれLiSシリ`ズだし、いつ梯子を外されてもおかしくない！ とえていましたが、最後は希望のあるめとなっていたのでひと安心??? column6: Con mejores graficos que el ya conocido COH este juego agrega nuevas dificultades al campo de batalla como tormentas de nieve
column7: bajas temperaturas y lagos congelados. La jugabilidad es similar a su antecesor considerando que ahora hay mas de tres commandantes a escoger y muchos de estos estan disponibles para comprar. Los rusos tienen una forma diferente de organización y los Alemanes mantienen ese mismo estilo con diferencias de armamento y uso de diferentes tipos de Tanques asi como vehiculos. El juego cuenta con un modo llamado Theater of War que sirve para misiones cooperativas o de un jugador ademas de posibles misiones para descargar y comprar. El modo historia ha sido uno de los mas polemicos ya que se opaca mucho a los Rusos por sus actos haciendo que el Metascore quede dividido. Es resumen es un buen juego que no sustituye al actual COH sino lo hace pareja para mantener ambos juegos en entretenidas batallas Online.

Compré este juego después de emocionarme por ver la nueva versión de " Micro Machines"  y luego decepcionarme al ver los reviews tan negativos que tiene el juego. Después de indagar un poco supe que existía Toybox Turbos y que mucha gente opina que es el verdadero sucesor espiritual de lo que alguna vez fue Micro Machines v3.   Es en esencia lo que alguna vez fue MMv3 aunque tiene pocos vehículos y pistas a diferencia de las que actualmente recuerdo. Muy bueno para jugar con 3 amigos más en multijugador local aunque sería muy bueno tener Workshop para que la gente pudiera crear más pistas

column6: Adeptes des RTS
column7: ceci est mon premier " Wargame"  Place à la tactique pure et dure sans se soucier de la gestion des ressources.  Plusieurs divisions historique d'infanteries ou mécanisés s'offrent à vous avec ces points forts et faibles. Vous devez ensuite choisir un certains nombres n'unités souvent spécifique pour constituer votre deck. Ceci offre pas mal de possibilité de choix et de gameplay. Ensuite c'est à vous de placer vos unités par un ingénieux système de crédit et les déplacer pour prendre le dessus sur votre adversaire ! Généralement l'erreur de pardonne pas !   Force et persévérance sont de mise surtout au début
column8: car un temps d'adaptation sera nécessaire pour ma?triser correctement les subtilités des unités et du jeu. Globalement les divisions sont équilibrés
column9: certaines sont plus flexible que d'autres ce qui pourra faire la différence sur certaines cartes plus ou moins ouvertes  Le jeu vous tiendra en halène tout au long d'une partie ainsi que votre concentration jusqu'à dénouement finale !  Cependant ceci peut être g?ché par le déséquilibre des joueurs en présences ! en effet il n'est pas rare de jouer avec des joueurs fra?chement débarqué en multi ! et de tomber contre des baroudeurs des premières heures de Steel Divisions 44 !  Je vous laisse imaginer la partie !  Ou encore une IA artificiellement difficile pour ne pas dire cheaté !   Quoiqu'il en soit
column10: votre expérience et vos connaissances de l'adversaire portera ces fruit pour arracher la victoire.  Mon seul regret ! ne pas avoir franchit le pas plus t?t ! J'attend avec impatience Steel Division 2

column12: beaucoup de joueurs des précédent Total War ont était dé?u?! L’équilibrage entre les différentes faction est certes présente mais le jeu donne la part belle à la défense. Il est fréquent de tomber sur des ??noob box?? c’est à dire une armée basé sur l’artillerie et autres unités à distance. Et d’attendre ainsi l’ennemie?! Cela à peu d’intérêt?!  Total War Warhammer offre plusieurs DLC?! Globalement ils sont bons. Mais le contenue n’est pas parfois à la hauteur du tarif.  La politique des DLC ne valorise pas le jeu ! Mais de nos jours rare sont les jeux sans une tel politique?!  Donc je ne dirai qu'une chose. Vive les Soldes pour profiter au maximum de Total War: Warhammer.

column6: Note: So far I only played 4 of the presumably 7 chapters.    Schatte ～The Witch and the Fake Shadow～  is by no means a must-play title
column7: and there are a lot better games out there. But I'd say it's alright
column8: it has some interesting and unique mechanics
column9: and I enjoyed it so far
column10: aside from some initial needless frustration.  The story is simple: The Shadow Demon had been sealed away
column11: but eventually broke free
column12: and now takes control of animate beings. For some reason
column13: Schatte
column14: the main character
column15: is unaffected. As a wielder of shadow magic
column16: she heads out to help survivors
column17: and to stop the contamination.  To use shadow magic
column18: Schatte needs to generate a shadow first. She can do this by positioning her familiar
column19: a bat with a jack o'lantern head that emits light. She can then interact with shadows in several ways to stun a target
column20: stabilize a movable object
column21: cure a possessed creature
column22: control a creature to borrow its abilities
column23: or dive into the shadow of an object to either climb slopes
column24: or to pass unharmed through obstacles.  The game itself is fairly linear
column25: and a level mostly consists of walking from the start point to an unspecified target location
column26: while fighting possessed creatures
column27: or solving puzzles with different kinds of shadow magic. There are some optional collectible objects in the form of journey entries or other documents
column28: but they are usually easy to find.  Once you have figured out the basic mechanics
column29: most fights so far are rather straightforward: Lock the light source to the enemy
column30: throw a Shadow Knife into its shadow to stun it
column31: then jump once or more on its shadow to cure it. Things become slightly more difficult when confronting multiple enemies at the same time
column32: and there was at least one considerably more difficult boss fight. But since Schatte gains experience / levels
column33: there's no reason to be concerned about a too high difficulty.  The puzzles are usually simple
column34: but it still can take a while or some experimentation to find the solution.   What I didn't like about the game:   There's no options menu
column35: except for the unity dialog at launch
column36: which at least allows to choose a resolution / quality setting
column37: and look up / change the controls.   Many parts of the first levels look very bland. But it gets better later.   Maybe it's just me
column38: but at the beginning I had a hard time understanding some of the basic mechanics. In particular
column39: I didn't understand which terms refer to buttons / keys (e.g.  Shadow Stamp )
column40: and which terms refer to actions associated with those (e.g.  Shadow Bind )
column41: and that I was supposed to tap a certain button / key.   There's only a single save state
column42: and the game automatically saves at certain points. That means if you accidentally select  Start  instead of  Continue  in the main menu
column43: you have to play certain parts of the game again. While there is a Chapter select option
column44: it doesn't allow to select single levels within this chapter
column45: and you cannot return to the main menu once you have entered this sub-menu; so if you select this
column46: you either have to replay the whole chapter
column47: or force-quit the game (I haven't tried this
column48: so do this at your own risk!) Fortunately
column49: character level and collectibles are not reset when replaying a chapter.   You can die at a certain part in the tutorial level  before  the game saves for the first time. This can easily happen if you didn't understand some of the instructions
column50: and when this happens you have to replay the whole tutorial with the not-completely-skippable dialogs.  While those issues can lead to some initial frustration
column51: the game plays fine once you know how to deal with those / are familiar with the basic mechanics.   All in all
column52: I'd recommend the game if...   ...you're looking for a small relaxing indie game with a witch theme
column53: and some unique mechanics   ...you don't mind the lack of sound options
column54: or in-game graphics / control settings   ...you are confident in your ability to navigate menues w/o accidentally selecting options that reset some of your level progress   ...you can handle some potential initial frustration (ymmv
column55: maybe I just didn't pay enough attention)   ...you don't need achievements or trading cards

Pós - Grafico. - Anima?oes. - Trilha sonora. - Cartas (muito interessante os personagens e magias) - Objetivo principal nitido.  - Tutorial completo. - Menu e op?oes bens elaborados.  - Itens do inventario Steam (voce ira ganhar no decorrer do jogo e podera vende-los no mercado steam)  Contras - Resolu?ao - Em alguns monitores e nao possivel jogar (mensagem monitor incompativel) - Quantidade de Itens ''dropados'' - Por incrivel que pare?a a quantidade de itens que voce ira ganhar jogando e muito grande. Isso deixará os itens desvalorizados em tempo record.  - Conquistas Steam - Nao entendo como um jogo dessa grandiozidade pode nao ter conquistas.  Cartas Colecionaveis - Nao faz sentido!!   Resumindo. Vale a pena comprar! Nao sei o motivo do valor do jogo ser relativamente alto porem acredito que a Valve colocou esse valor por uma justa causa.  Livre de cheaters e com sua identidade o jogo promete ter um publico alto e quem come?ar a jogar agora
column8: provavelmente terá algum tipo de beneficio em rela?ao aos demais jogadores que esperarem para comprar em promo?ao.  Duvidas
column9: criticas ou sugestoes ? Postem ai.. Aberto a todos comentarios.  Espero ter ajudado. Abra?os! :D

column6: O MELHOR JOGO DO F1   F1 2017 Desenvolvido pela Codemaster e lan?ado em 2017 é um jogo baseado na temporada de 2017 da Fórmula 1  Com um Gráfico de cair o queixo e com uma ótima jogabilidade F1 2017 é um dos melhores jogos de corrida que já joguei.   Gráficos - S?o incriveis! Sem duvidas um dos melhores gráficos que já vi em um jogo de corrida! As texturas s?o muito realistas e n?o deixam a desejar
column7: os efeitos de ilumina??o s?o belíssimos!
column8: e as texturas tanto a do asfalto como da zebra
column9: grama n?o deixam a desejar.  - Os pilotos s?o muito bem feitos em compara??o ao f1 2015
column10: 2016 mas acho que poderiam ter dado uma polida nas anima??es. - Os circuitos foram melhorados
column11: agora parecem vivos! Teve um aumento nas pessoas no paddock
column12: o público
column13: em torno da pista e até na linha de largada.   Gameplay - Houve uma melhoria na jogabilidade e foram feitas mudan?as nas trilhas dos carros durante provas com chuva
column14: Utiliza??o do DRS
column15: e até a utiliza??o do vácuo de seus adversários. - Uma jogabilidade fácil e simples que qualquer um pode aprender a jogar. - Os carros ficaram bem mais pesados em compara??o ao 2016. N?o chega a ser um simulador super realista mas é bem divertido você botar seu volante desligar todas as assistencias e jogar!    Audio e trilha sonora Você ja percebe que o jogo tem uma ótima trilha quando na cutscene inicial já toca " Born to be wild (Remix)"  - O Som dos carros está muito fiél a realidade. - O barulho da água da chuva pesada
column16: batendo no seu carro.  - O som do vento ao ativar o DRS é sencacional! e gera muito mais realismo ao jogo. - O Rádio é incrivelmente realista
column17: ocorre de tudo! desde interferências no túnel de m?naco  até " conversar"  com o engenheiro. - A Dublagem em PT-BR é boa mas peca com atrasos nas vozes e isso aconteceu também no 2016   Carros - Temos todos os carros de 2017 e agora com as pinturas atualizadas. - Podemos correr com os carros clássicos (parte mais divertida). S?o 12 carros classicos como a famosa Mclaren mp4/4 pilotada por Ayrton senna e Alain prost. Temos também a Ferrari F2004 pilotada por Michael Schumacher e Rubens Barrichello. Dentre outros carros clássicos. - As texturas dos carros s?o extremamente reais! já certas pinturas n?o podemos dizer que s?o 100% fiéis pois nem todos os patrocinadores est?o destacados no carro. Ex: Williams 2017
column18: McLaren MP4-13
column19: McLaren MP4/4 e todas as ferraris clássicas dentre outros carros.   Anima??es - S?o muito bem feitas comparadas ao f1 2016. - Tem alguns pequenos bugs. - As anima??es do pitstop s?o exelentes! - Anima??o facial n?o é t?o boa. - Sincronia labial também é bem falha. - As anima??es de dentro do cockpit s?o muito reais e imersivas.   Modo Carreira - O Game n?o possui um modo história mas sim um modo carreira que você pode criar seu proprio piloto e correr em todas as equipes. Come?ar de baixo e chegar no topo! Ao todo s?o 10 temporadas no modo carreira. - O modo de campeonatos é interessante pois se divide em " Campeonatos e Eventos Exclusivos Clássicos" . - Os campeonatos s?o divididos em 20 categorias unicas como: Campeonato Oficial 2017 da Fórmula 1
column20: Campeonato de Sprint
column21: Campeonato de Dobradinhas
column22: Série de Rua Clássica e por ae vai! Você irá desbloqueando novos campeonatos ganhando pontos. - Você pode Importar seu piloto do F1 2016 caso tenha o save game. - ?rvore de aprimoramentos gigantesca!.   Prós: Jogabilidade aprimorada Gráficos de cair o queixo Carreira muito mais complexa que seus antecessores Muitos campeonatos Carros ic?nicos Circuitos com tra?ados alternativos Pilotar a McLaren MP4/4   Contras: Alguns bugs de texturas Personagens repetidos e bugados N?o tem os circuitos clássicos como visto no f1 2013 Sem os pilotos clássicos (Lendários) Bugs    Conclus?o...  F1 2017 é sem duvidas o melhor jogo baseado em Fórmula 1 que você irá jogar. Com muitas melhorias e trazendo mais complexidade ao modo Carreira.  - A Parte gráfica está exelente. - O ?udio e trilha sonora s?o muito bons mas poderiam ter melhorado a sincronia labial. - A Codemasters pecou colocando nomes ficticios nos pilotos de carros clássicos.  A todos os f?s de F1 podem comprar sem medo! e as pessoas que n?o s?o f?s também! o jogo oferece boas horas de divers?o! Vale cada centavo!!!
